items.todoItem: Don’t condemn others so that you yourself are not likewise condemned.
Know that you will be judged the same way that you judge others.
Know that the measure that you deal to others will be dealt to you.
Don’t look for lesser faults in others whilst ignoring greater faults of your own.
Don’t try to address the lesser faults of others whilst possessing far greater faults.
Consider the hypocrisy of how you judge your brother.
First address your own greater faults before considering the lesser faults of others.
Don’t present the gospel to those who repeatedly mock, scorn and deride it.
Don’t waste the message of truth on those who ignorantly reject it.
Ask, seek, knock. God is waiting for your request.
Ask, and it shall be given to you.
Seek, and ye shall find.
Knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
Know that everyone who asks receives.
Know that he who seeks shall find.
Know that to him that knocks it shall be opened.
Ask your Father in heaven for good things.
Know that your Father in heaven wishes to give good things to those who ask.
Do to others as you would have them do to you.
Seek the narrow way that leads to life.
Don’t go along the broad way with the many that leads to destruction.
Know that there are few that find the narrow way that leads to life.
Beware of false prophets.
Know that false prophets disguise themselves outwardly.
Recognise false prophets by their fruits despite their outward appearance.
Know that every good tree yields good fruit but a corrupt tree yields evil fruit.
Know that a good tree cannot yield evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree yield good fruit.
Know that every tree that does not yield good fruit is cut down and burned.
Know false prophets by their fruits.
Know that not all who call Jesus Lord will enter the kingdom of heaven.
Know that only those that do the will of the Father will enter the kingdom of heaven.
Know that many wonderful works will not save you.
Seek to know Jesus personally.
Hear and do what Jesus says.
Build your house upon a rock.
Know that tribulation and adversity will come and beat against your house.
Know that every house built on the rock of Christ will not fall.
Don’t build your house upon sand.
Don’t ignore and fail to do what Jesus says.
Know that every house not built on the rock of Christ will greatly fall.
Be taught by the one who teaches with authority.
